data.title: Steve Coogan Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Steve Coogan on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Steve Coogan including Despicable Me 3, Despicable Me 2, and more.
data.text:
Episode 7

Jeremy and the Stig race two Caterham 7s around a circuit in Scotland, but Jeremy needs to build his own car from scratch first. Richard and James road-test the Ford S-max, the Mercedes B200 turbo and the Vauxhall Zafira VXR - three family cars that promise a bit of excitement. Plus comedian Steve Coogan is the Star in a Reasonably Priced Car.

Caravan Conkers

Richard heads for the south of France, via the Alps, in the Pagani Zonda roadster, Top Gear gets its hands on steel cable and cranes for a fun filled game of caravan conkers and there's a clash of titans on the test track.

Bunch of Marys

Martinâs mother Debra is keeping busy hitting the campaign trail to support Mary Robinsonâs bid for the Irish presidency. A neglected Martin soon tires of his sisterâs cooking and befriends new boy Trevor whose chef-parents feed the boys like kings.

A Tale of Two Dentists

Unexpectedly, a new young dentist, Dr. Stanway, opens up a swanky new practice across the street from Bob. Bob panics and threatens a dental fight to the last root canal; until Dr. Stanway pops over for a friendly visit.
